newsitem.title: BANGLADESH: Bangladesh to cut duty on bus, truck imports.
newsitem.headline: Bangladesh to cut duty on bus, truck imports.

text.p: Bangladesh Finance Minister S.A.M.S. Kibria on Thursday proposed to reduce customs duty on completely manufactured bus, minibus and truck imports to 22.5 percent from 30 percent in fiscal 1997/98 beginning on July 1.

"To promote competitiveness of local assembling industries, I also propose to reduce customs duty on the import of completely knocked down bus, minibus and truck from 15 percent to 7.5 percent," Kibria said in parliament while presenting the new budget.
He said the government attached "top priority" to the development of a rapid mass transport system.
